SELECT l.idx, title, name, link_url, reg_date, l.use_at, l.campus_id, l.week FROM lecture_table l where l.idx = #{idx}

select l.idx, l.title, l.name as professor, a.name, a.in_date, a.out_date, a.std_num, timestampdiff(MINUTE, a.in_date, a.out_date) as timediff, (select count(std_num) from attendance_table at where at.std_num = a.std_num and at.lecture_id = #{idx}) as category_cnt, ( select sum(timestampdiff(MINUTE, in_date, out_date)) from attendance_table tm where tm.lecture_id= #{idx} and tm.std_num = a.std_num group by std_num ) as whole_timediff from lecture_table l join attendance_table a on a.lecture_id = l.idx where l.idx = #{idx}
